item.title: 美国芯片公司的中国单位因与伊朗有关联而受到制裁
item.description: 美国政府制裁了中国、土耳其和阿拉伯联合酋长国的二十多家公司，其中包括一家美国芯片公司的分支机构，指控这些企业向伊朗军方或代理人提供非法支持。【原文：The US government sanctioned more than two dozen companies in China, Turkey and the United Arab Emirates, including offshoots of a US chip firm, accusing the businesses of providing illicit support to Iran’s military or proxies.】

item.title: 调查简街的前交易员结束在印度监管机构的任期
item.description: 阿南特-纳拉扬（Ananth Narayan）作为印度证券监管机构的高级官员领导了对简街集团有限责任公司（Jane Street Group LLC）的高调调查，他将在周四结束三年任期后移交调查工作。【原文：Ananth Narayan, who led a high-profile probe into Jane Street Group LLC as a senior official at India’s securities regulator, will hand over the investigation as his three-year term ends on Thursday.】

item.title: 软银股价大涨 13%，ABB 机器人交易助推牛市增长
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的股价飙升13%，创下盘中新高，原因是该公司计划收购ABB有限公司（ABB Ltd. ）的机器人部门，从而提升了人们对人工智能带来利润增长的预期。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s stock surged as much as 13% to a fresh intraday high as its plan to buy ABB Ltd.’s robotics arm boosted expectations for profit growth from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 报道称将启动新泻基金，日本电力公司股价上涨
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，日本最大的公用事业公司将成立一个基金，以支持新泻县的发展。【原文：Shares of Japan’s biggest utility jumped on Thursday, after local media reported the company will create a fund supporting Niigata prefecture, home to one of its beleaguered nuclear power plants.】

item.title: 三井住友信托基金经理的目标是排名前三
item.description: 三井住友信托集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Group Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Group Inc.’s asset management firm is aiming to become one of the top-three managers of Japanese mutual funds in five years by bolstering offerings to individuals, its new chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 新加坡顶级基金 LionGlobal 以 "被遗忘 "的小盘股取胜
item.description: Lion Global Investors Ltd. 投资新加坡中小型公司股票的策略使其成为新加坡表现最好的公司之一。【原文：Lion Global Investors Ltd.’s strategy of investing in the shares of small and medium-sized Singaporean companies has made it one of the best performers in the city-state.】

item.title: 联盟谈判陷入僵局，日本高市面临早期考验
item.description: 日本新执政党领袖佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）尚未与该党的长期联盟伙伴公明党（Komeito）就继续结盟达成协议，这凸显了她在建立稳定的政府方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Japan’s new ruling party leader, Sanae Takaichi, has yet to reach an agreement with the party’s long-time coalition partner Komeito about continuing their alliance, a delay that highlights the challenges she faces in building a stable administration.】

item.title: 凤凰城大学支持者在首次公开募股中筹资 1.36 亿美元
item.description: 凤凰城大学的所有者 Phoenix Education Partners Inc. 的股东在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.36 亿美元，股票定价处于市场定价范围的中间位置。【原文：Shareholders of Phoenix Education Partners Inc., the owner of the University of Phoenix, raised $136 million in an initial public offering, pricing the shares in the middle of a marketed range.】

item.title: 史维特斯考虑与二叠纪盆地竞争对手 SM 能源公司合并
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一直在权衡出售事宜的石油和天然气勘探公司 Civitas Resources Inc.【原文：Civitas Resources Inc., an oil and gas explorer that has been weighing a sale, is considering a merger with Permian Basin rival SM Energy Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储降息带来的支持减少，亚洲债券看似脆弱
item.description: 随着各国央行的宽松周期接近尾声，亚洲新兴国家债券的吸引力必将下降，而广泛预期的美联储减息政策今年也不会给该地区带来多少缓和。【原文：Emerging Asian bonds are set to become less attractive as central bankers near the end of their easing cycles, with widely anticipated Federal Reserve cuts offering little reprieve for the region this year.】

item.title: 黄金从创纪录水平回落，交易商在暴涨后获利了结
item.description: 黄金在周三达到每盎司 4,000 美元以上的历史最高点后下跌，此前的狂热反弹使价格很容易受到回调的影响，因为有迹象表明贵金属交易正处于过热的水平。【原文：Gold dipped after peaking at an all-time high above $4,000 an ounce on Wednesday, following a torrid rally that’s left prices vulnerable to pullbacks amid signs that the precious metal is trading at overheated levels.】

item.title: 黄金暴涨、日本央行加息疑虑削弱日元避风港地位
item.description: 在全球面临压力的时候，日元作为避风港的地位面临越来越多的质疑，有可能加剧本周日币跌至八个月低点的抛售。【原文：The yen’s status as a haven in times of global stress faces growing skepticism, threatening to exacerbate a selloff that sent the Japanese currency to an eight-month low this week.】

item.title: 关注加沙和平计划和美国库存，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于交易商关注中东紧张局势降温和美国库存增加，石油回落。【原文：Oil retreated as traders focused on cooling tensions in the Middle East and higher US inventories.】

item.title: 策略师急于上调日经指数年末目标，寄希望于经济增长
item.description: 日本最大券商的策略师们正在上调日经 225 平均指数的目标，因为他们认为新当选的执政党领袖佐佐江隆一将推出大规模刺激政策，推动蓝筹股基准指数突破历史新高。【原文：Strategists from Japan’s largest brokerages are raising their targets for the Nikkei 225 Stock Average on the view that the newly elected ruling party leader Sanae Takaichi will unleash large-scale stimulus and push the blue-chip benchmark past its record high.】

item.title: 债务危机迫在眉睫，纳西姆-塔勒布警告对冲危机
item.description: 黑天鹅》一书的作者纳西姆-塔勒布（Nassim Taleb）说，投资者应该为股市崩盘投保，因为美国债务负担等结构性问题有可能使原本势不可挡的涨势脱轨。【原文：The Black Swan author Nassim Taleb said investors should insure against a stock-market crash as structural issues such as the US debt burden threaten to derail an otherwise unstoppable rally.】

item.title: 中国股市重新开市，人工智能热潮是否压倒软性支出
item.description: 中国股市在黄金周休市后于周四重新开盘，投资者正在权衡对人工智能的新热情能否压倒消费支出疲软的迹象。【原文：China’s markets reopen on Thursday after the Golden Week break with investors weighing whether renewed enthusiasm for artificial intelligence can outweigh signs of soft consumer spending.】

item.title: 国土安全部网络人员在特朗普驱逐行动中被重新分配工作
item.description: 据国土安全部的现任和前任雇员称，美国国土安全部已将包括网络人员在内的数百名国家安全专家调往支持唐纳德-特朗普总统驱逐行动的工作岗位，并表示将解雇任何拒绝服从的人。【原文：The US Department of Homeland Security has shifted hundreds of national security specialists, including cyber personnel, into jobs that support President Donald Trump’s deportations and said it would dismiss anyone who refuses to go along, according to current and former DHS employees.】

item.title: 无人机防御公司大涨 754%，提振澳大利亚小盘股
item.description: 由于地缘政治紧张局势加剧有利于国防承包商，金价飙升也为矿业股提供了支撑，澳大利亚小型股指数有望创下 2009 年以来的最佳业绩。【原文：An index of Australian small caps is on track for its best year since 2009, as heightened geopolitical tensions favor defense contractors and the soaring gold price supports mining stocks.】

item.title: 能源公司在日本抢购气象服务以获得交易优势
item.description: 天气预报员在日本的电力交易热潮中找到了一个有利可图的利基市场，他们向那些在世界上最动荡的电力市场中寻求优势的公司出售超级专业化的数据。【原文：Weather forecasters are finding a lucrative niche in Japan’s power-trading boom, selling hyper-specialized data to firms seeking an edge in one of the world’s most volatile electricity markets.】

item.title: 比索疲软引发价格风险，菲律宾将维持关键利率不变
item.description: 菲律宾央行预计将于周四暂停宽松货币政策，因为比索疲软有可能引发通货膨胀。【原文：The Philippine central bank is expected to pause its monetary easing on Thursday, as the weak peso risks stoking inflation.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因美国股市上涨而上涨，中国将重新开放：市场综述
item.description: 在美国基准股市创下新高后，亚洲股市周四将继续攀升，这主要得益于与人工智能热潮相关的公司进一步上涨。【原文：Asian stocks were set to climb Thursday after US benchmarks set new highs, helped by further gains for companies linked to the artificial-intelligence boom.】

item.title: 巴西税收法案崩溃，破坏卢拉的财政战略
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）领导的政府周三未能推动国会通过一项至关重要的增收措施，从而使巴西 2026 年的财政目标面临风险，并加剧了人们对其支撑公共财政能力的怀疑。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s government failed to push a crucial revenue-raising measure through Congress on Wednesday, putting Brazil’s 2026 fiscal goal at risk and intensifying doubts about its ability to shore up public finances.】

item.title: 为什么这次美国政府关门与以往不同
item.description:
在本期《特朗普经济学》中，我们将探讨华盛顿的基本动态发生了怎样的变化，以及这对经济意味着什么。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, we look at how the underlying dynamics in Washington have changed and what it means for the economy.

】

item.title: 斯塔默就英国数字身份证计划向印度取经
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）会见了印度数字身份证计划的一位重要设计者，英国首相正就在英国实施类似系统寻求指导。【原文：Keir Starmer met with a key architect of India’s digital ID program, as the British prime minister sought guidance on implementing a similar system in the UK.】

item.title: 英国财政部严禁大臣动用紧急基金
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）试图严格控制公共开支，因此英国财政部告诉大臣们，它正在限制紧急政府基金的使用。【原文：The UK Treasury has told ministers it is clamping down on the use of emergency government funds, as Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves seeks to keep a tight grip on public spending.】

item.title: 为什么 OpenAI、Nvidia 和 AMD 之间的循环人工智能交易令人瞠目结舌？
item.description:
OpenAI与Nvidia。甲骨文与 OpenAI。Nvidia与甲骨文。今天的大事件：人工智能巨头正在进行循环交易—而一些分析师对此持怀疑态度。【原文：

OpenAI and Nvidia. Oracle and OpenAI. Nvidia and Oracle. Today on the Big Take: AI giants are making circular deals — and some analysts are skeptical.

item.title: Seven & i 在收购失败后努力赢回投资者的青睐
item.description: 自 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.放弃 6.77 万亿日元（444 亿美元）收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Almost three months have passed since Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. abandoned its ¥6.77 trillion ($44.4 billion) bid to acquire Seven & i Holdings Co., yet the stock remains 24% below the proposed price with few signs of reversing course.】

item.title: 钯金创下2023年以来最大涨幅，黄金打破新纪录
item.description: 钯金大涨近10%，创下自2023年5月以来的最大涨幅，因投资者纷纷涌入避险天堂，贵金属涨势加快。由于黄金突破 4000 美元，白银反弹，钯金攀升至每盎司 1482.65 美元，实现了三日连涨。【原文：Palladium surged nearly 10%, its biggest advance since May 2023, as gains across precious metals accelerated with investors piling into havens. The metal climbed to $1,482.65 an ounce, marking a three-day winning streak, as gold topped $4,000 and silver rallied.】

item.title: MJH 生命科学公司提高 4.3 亿美元垃圾级贷款收益率
item.description: 医疗保健媒体公司 MJH Life Sciences 被迫更改 4.3 亿美元贷款的条款，以便为收购一家营销公司提供资金。【原文：MJH Life Sciences, a healthcare media company, was forced to change the terms of a $430 million loan to help finance its acquisition of a marketing firm.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司旗下 Rockpoint Gas 在多伦多首次公开募股中募集 5.045 亿美元资金
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德的 Rockpoint Gas Storage Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了约 7.04 亿加元（5.045 亿美元）的资金，其股票定价为市场范围的最高价。【原文：Brookfield’s Rockpoint Gas Storage Inc. raised about C$704 million ($504.5 million) in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of the marketed range.】
